title: "How To Live Undistracted" With Bob Goff
itunes:title: "How To Live Undistracted" With Bob Goff
description:
Let's admit it, most of us are pretty easily distracted. If we're breathing, there are thousands of things a day vying for our attention daily.
 
 But how do we do this? Today on the podcast our friend and author, Bob Goff walks through how to live more intentional lives. When we stop focusing on what everyone else is doing, we can stop being distracted from what God is doing. With scriptural insight and practical advice, together we'll learn to orient our lives and hold on to hope when everything feels overwhelming.

Related Resources:

  • Start living a less-distracted, more joy-filled and love-oriented life with Bob's new study, Undistracted Study Guide plus Streaming Video: Capture Your Purpose. Rediscover Your Joy

  • Connect with Bob on his website bobgoff.com.

  • Has the Proverbs 31 Ministries Podcast helped you grow in your faith or gain fresh biblical perspective? Tell us about it by leaving a review on Apple Podcasts. When you review and rate the podcast, it helps us reach even more people with biblical Truth.

Click here to download the transcript for this episode.
